item.title: What's New in February 2025
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: From remote-first to hybrid: Weâ€™ve transitioned to a hybrid model, coordinated schedules, and rolled out perks like lunch support, transport coverage, and an Office Leaderboard to keep engagement high.

item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Building the teamâ€™s second brain: Progress in platform & data engineering, smarter decision-making, and new directions ahead. Sharpening OGIF weekly sharing: Updates to align with team priorities and industry trends for deeper learning.

item.description: Weâ€™re Hiring: On the lookout for Full-stack Engineers, Biz Devs, and Marketing minds to join the team. Labs OGIF Office Hour - Building Core Knowledge: Weekly sessions diving deep into AI, Blockchain, Architecture, and Finance fundamentals.

item.title: What's New in August 2024
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Reporting tech signal: How AI tools like Cursor and Claude 3.5 Sonnet are changing programming, with insights on generative apps, prompt caching, and structured outputs.

item.title: What's New in July 2024
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Reporting Tech Signals: Significant AI advancements, cybersecurity focus, and shifting software development trends. memo.d.foundation: You can now access new commands to view the memo list and automate weekly reports.

item.title: Weekly Digest #13: More than lines of code
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Welcome to this week’s edition of our roundup, where we highlight the moments that make us more than just lines of code.

item.title: Weekly Digest #12: Summer moments - Our team's remote work adventures
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: You know, thereâ€™s something magical about bringing people together around what they love. It might seem simple, but a lot of thought goes into it.

item.title: What's New in June 2024
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: memo.d.foundation: more entries focusing on software design, LLM and blockchain, a key focus of our continuous learning journey. Increased ICY Rewards: the increasing amount of fleeting notes boosted our learning reward system.

item.title: Weekly Digest #11: Come grow with us
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Things are always cooking on our Discord. So grab a virtual seat at our table, pour yourself a cup of something tasty, and enjoy the digest.

item.title: Memo Knowledge Base Meeting
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Memo knowledge base meeting Memo is our team’s wiki on how we work, learn, operate the team at Dwarves. It’s a one-stop shop for all things Dwarves, written by us for fellow craftsmen.

item.title: Weekly Digest #10: From lean to learner
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Double digits, I can’t believe we’ve reached our 10th digest! It’s been quite a journey putting together each edition and a blast creating these for you.

item.description: Choosing the right directory for the right topic The first thing is to determine the field that youâ€™re writing in.
